description:
Dot loves to hear the echoes of elephants trumpeting through Big Cat Canyon.  
Transform Dot into a magical instrument that can trumpet like elephants and mimic other sounds.

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn the lights off. Then make Dot turn on green lights when button 1 is pressed.

hints.description: Link Start to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue. Link the Lights Off state to the Green light using a Button 1 Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on green lights, make Dot play an elephant sound when a voice is heard. Then make Dot instantly turn the lights off again.
puzzles.introduction: The Voice Heard cue lets Dot hear when you speak, play music, or blow into the microphone.

hints.description: Drag out an Animals sound. Set the sound to Elephant. Link the Green light to the sound using a Voice Heard cue. Link the sound to the Lights Off state using an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After turning off the lights, make Dot turn on yellow lights when button 2 is pressed.

hints.description: Drag out a Yellow light. Link the Lights Off state to the Yellow light using a Button 2 Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot play a custom sound when a voice is heard. Then make Dot instantly turn the lights off again.
puzzles.introduction: Use Custom sounds to make your own recordings! Choose a sound slot then touch the gold record button.

hints.description: Drag out a Custom Sound and record something. Link the Yellow light to the sound using a Voice Heard cue. Link the sound to the Lights Off state using an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dot turn on red lights when button 3 is pressed.

hints.description: Drag out a Red light. Link the states with a Button 3 Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot play a custom sound when a voice is heard. Then make Dot instantly turn the lights off again.

hints.description: Drag out a Custom Sound and record something. Link the Red light to the sound using a Voice Heard cue. Link the sound to the Lights Off state using an Instant cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot pretend to be a magical trumpet. Blow into Dot's microphone and press each button.
puzzles.introduction: Now it's time to try out your trumpet!
